comment.author: 41616074@N05
comment._content: it appears to be production process for making particle board

comment.author: 20679134@N02
comment._content: Fir Tex was a soft fibrous material that was popular in the 40's & 50's to cover walls in some houses.  It was pretty much replaced by sheet rock in the 50's.  It was about 3/4 of an inch thick and soft and not very durable.  No fun to work with.
